title: What are some examples of ignorance being the root of all evil? - Quora

response.answer_text: The LDS church. Now, I grew up Mormon but left years and years ago so I get to say this shit haha. Did you know Ted Bundy joined the Mormon church when he moved to Utah so he’d blend in better? Did you know his ward picketed and “swore he’d never do that” once his accusations came about? That’s how they are. Tons and tons of corruption and sexual abuse is retaliated with only “No, they would never do that!” Mormons will fight you to the death on that. You could have even shoved a picture of Ted Bundy dragging a dead body in their face and they’d still swear he was innocent. That’s how religions work (especially this cult). These sheeple are so blindly ignorant, they’ll listen to anything and everything this “prophet” says. You have no idea how many people (especially women) I know who have been sexually assaulted by someone in the church. Not only do these people take advantage of becoming the boy scout’s leader (being alone with a bunch of 12 year olds), but they don’t get in trouble. Someone rapes a 5 year old girl, but doesn’t get excommunicated (or incarcerated) because he’s “important to the church” and has these blind ignoramuses to fight for him. But someone questions the church and writes about it, instant excommunication…. See a pattern, here?

Having expectations and negative attachments in some basic things Seeing divisions is another big one .If you see another person or creature and you feel you are superior than him her it, that you are very different and you create a wall then thats ignorance. Illuminated people see that we are all One and nothing really separates us. Apply this in our world where we are all separated in classes , genders, races, colours , religions , sport teams, nations , countries etc and you will see how evil comes from ignorance. Without such divisions there would be no wars , no fights , no hate, no anger , no feeling of superiority or inferiority , no sexism .
